title: Camera
thought: Theme parks can snap a crystal clear picture of you on a roller coaster at 70 mph, but bank cameras can't get a clear shot of a robber standing still.

title: History
thought: If my calculator had a history, it would be more embarrassing than my browser history.

title: Intentions
thought: Lawyers hope you get sued, doctors hope you get sick, cops hope you're criminal, mechanics hope you have car trouble, but only a thief wishes prosperity for you.

title: Being Naive
thought: As a kid my parents taught me to not believe everything I see on TV, now I have to teach them to not believe everything they see on Facebook.

title: Height
thought: Tall people are expected to use their reach to help shorter people, but if a tall person were to ask a short person to hand them something they dropped on the floor it'd be insulting.

title: Wedding
thought: Whoever created the tradition of not seeing the bride in the wedding dress beforehand saved countless husbands everywhere from hours of dress shopping and will forever be a hero to all men

title: Voice
thought: Being able to tolerate the sound of your own voice in a video is probably the highest form of self acceptance.

title: Refrigerator
thought: We do not check the refrigerator multiple times to find new food, we check to see if our standards have dropped enough to eat what was available.

title: Lemon
thought: Apparently, a lemon is not naturally occurring and is a hybrid developed by cross breeding a bitter orange and a citron. Life never gave us lemons; we invented them all by ourselves.

title: Tobacco
thought: Tobacco companies kill their best customers and condom companies kill their future customers.
